definition: bolt (for locking a window, cabinet etc)/(electrical) plug
to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: The door has a snap bolt .
Lock blade arm down with safety latch before installing handle.
sentences.chinese: 安装手柄前请用安全插销锁下刀臂。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a semi-automatic bolt for a window (door), belonging to the field of architectural hardware.
sentences.chinese: 一种半自动门窗插销，属于一种建筑五金材料。

sentences.english: He stretched himself on her threshold and uttered his complaints to the cruel bolts and bars .
sentences.chinese: 他匍伏在她门槛上对着冷酷无情的插销门栓倾诉哀怨。

sentences.english: Open the ladder fully and lock the spreaders in place.
sentences.chinese: 把梯子完全打开，锁住插销。

sentences.english: CL211: Both right and left open purposed plug type hinge with convenient installation and reasonable structure.
sentences.chinese: 左右门均通用的插销式铰链，安装方便，结构合理。

sentences.english: Microstructure of the joints and fracture morphology of implant samples were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了插销焊接接头的组织和插销试样的断口形貌。

sentences.english: Microstructure of the joints and fracture morphology of implant samples were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了插销焊接接头的组织和插销试样的断口形貌。

sentences.english: He learned how to fix window glasses and latches.
sentences.chinese: 他学着装窗上的玻璃和插销。
带贯穿螺栓门栓的加固插销。

sentences.english: I bored a hole so that the fixing bolt would pass through.
sentences.chinese: 我钻了个孔，好让固定插销穿过去。

sentences.english: Plastic dead bolt lock. RH and LH application.
sentences.chinese: 塑料固定式插销锁，左右门均适用。

sentences.english: Plug-pin steel-tube scaffold full size model test research and safety performance appraisal.
sentences.chinese: 插销式钢管脚手架整架受力性能及安全性评价。

sentences.english: This video plays intermittent as a result of the poor contact of the plug.
sentences.chinese: 这台录影机放音断断续续的，就插销接触不好。

definition: variant of 門閂|门闩[men2 shuan1]
horizontal bar to hold a door closed (made of wood or metal)/door bolt
